description: WhatsApp is rolling out an update to beta testers, introducing a new feature aimed at safeguarding users from unwanted messages from unknown accounts. The optional feature automatically protects users from unidentified senders by filtering messages under certain conditions.
title: WhatsApp Beta Introduces Feature to Block Messages From Unknown Accounts

description: iPhone 17 display specifications have been leaked, shortly after the iPhone 16 series went on sale for the first time. The iPhone 17 series is expected to launch in the latter half of 2025, and they are expected to include a display feature currently exclusive to Pro models.
title: iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Slim to Arrive With 120Hz LTPO OLED Displays: Report

description: Oppo Find X8 series is expected to launch in China soon, and details of the next-generation flagship smartphones have recently begun to surface online. A tipster has now leaked the expected launch date for the Oppo Find X8 series in China. Additionally, a company executive has revealed a glimpse of the smartphone's display, featuring notably slim bezels, alongside the newly released iPhone 16 Pro model.
title: Oppo Find X8 Series Launch Date Tipped, Company Teases Slim Display Bezels Ahead of Debut

description: Infinix Zero Flip 5G specifications, price range in India and colour options have been leaked by a tipster, ahead of the launch of the smartphone in India. The company's first clamshell-style foldable phone is expected to launch soon, and has already been teased by Infinix earlier this month.
title: Infinix Zero Flip 5G Key Specifications, Colour Options and Price Range in India Leaked Ahead of Anticipated Debut

description: The US Securities and Exchange Commission plans to seek sanctions against Elon Musk for not attending the court-mandated testimony on September 10 related to its investigation into his acquisition of Twitter for $44 billion. The SEC's motion seeks an order to show cause why Musk should not be held in civil contempt for informing them just three hours before his scheduled testimony that he would be absent.
title: US SEC Intends to Seek Sanctions Against Elon Musk in Twitter Probe

description: Customer data such as medical reports from Star Health Insurance has been made publicly available through chatbots on Telegram. The alleged chatbot creator told a security researcher that the private information of millions was up for sale, with samples accessible via Telegram chatbots.
title: Hacker Uses Telegram Chatbots to Leak Data of Star Health Insurance

description: Samsung Galaxy S24 FE and Galaxy Tab S10 series could be launched soon. Both the Samsung Galaxy S24 FE and Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 series are expected to arrive with support for the company's Galaxy AI features. The company recently opened reservations for its next generation of tablets in India, but an official launch date is still awaited.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24 FE, Galaxy Tab S10 Series Could Launch on September 26

description: Qualcomm is said to have recently approached Intel to discuss a potential acquisition of the chipmaker, a move that could significantly transform the industry but face regulatory scrutiny. Qualcomm's CEO, Cristiano Amon, is said to have taken a personal role in the acquisition talks with US chipmaker Intel.
title: Qualcomm Said to Have Approached Intel About a Takeover in Recent Days
